# lyne-toggle



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                      | Attribute         | Description                                                             | Type      | Default                 |
| ----------------------------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------- |
| `checked`                     | `checked`         | Set to true to to show checked state initially                          | `boolean` | `false`                 |
| `disabled`                    | `disabled`        |                                                                         | `boolean` | `undefined`             |
| `eventId`                     | `event-id`        | Id which is sent in the click event payload                             | `string`  | `undefined`             |
| `icon`                        | `icon`            | Define if icon should be shown or not                                   | `boolean` | `false`                 |
| `label`                       | `label`           | Label text for the toggle checkbox                                      | `string`  | `'Default button text'` |
| `labelPlacement` _(required)_ | `label-placement` | If you use an icon without a label, you must provide an iconDescription | `string`  | `undefined`             |
| `name`                        | `name`            | The name attribute to use for the button                                | `string`  | `undefined`             |
| `value`                       | `value`           | The value attribute to use for the button                               | `string`  | `undefined`             |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                            |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| `"unnamed"` | Slot to render svg icon. You must pass an svg-element. |
